Free Yourself From Nonsense

A responsive, mobile-first theme with everything you need, and nothing you don’t

Highly Customizable

Everything is built with SASS. Want smaller padding? Different colors? It's all just a variable away.

Clean & Timeless

If you just want to set it and forget it, don't sweat it. This theme isn't going to look like outdated crap 5 years down the road.

Vanilla JavaScript

Imbue doesn't rely on any fancy-schmancy JS libraries. If you want to include jQuery or React, I won't tell anyone.

No Bloat!

We're grownups, right? We don't need a million Google Fonts preloaded, we can switch them out ourselves.

Imbue exists to save you time, not to hold your hand

We've all seen them. The big themes, the top sellers, the ones that promise you a bucket full of rainbows, the ones that are supposedly so easy to use, even your grandma could do it. 500 HTML files! 600 PSD templates! A whole smorgasboard of bloated, slapped-together jQuery plugins for every occasion!

And what happens next? The site runs like a potato. All the precious seconds you spend staring at that slick loading spinner give you time to think about how bigger isn't always better. So what's the solution? What kind of theme do you use when you want a head start without including everything but the kitchen sink?

Enter Imbue: a no-nonsense theme for people who don't like their hand to be held, because eww, cooties.
